attributes.action: A bank holiday to represent all Black people in this Country.
attributes.additional_details:
Black lives matter sent a shock wave around the world, yet nothing has changed. I want history lessons to include contributions made by Black people as a simple act of appreciation will go a long way to show we care. To also show how as a United Kingdom - Slavery was forced to end - Now let's end Racism.
My wife is from Africa & I have a mixed race son, they are now British as are millions of Black People in the UK, equality & mitral respect will build a better future.
attributes.background: The UK ended slavery in 1833, Black people fought by our side in both World Wars making the same sacrifices as our fathers. I want a Bank Holiday to represent their contribution to society, a day to celebrate & be proud. Just One day for Equality
